ticket.title: [PATCH] script/rails plugin install fails silently
ticket.original-body:
Trying to install a plugin from a Git URL will fail silently on systems where Git is not installed. I added a method to determine whether Git is installed on the system and exit with a warning if it is not.
I want to write a test for this, what's the best place to put it?
